LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Artificial_Terminated.label: terminated
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Artificial_Disabled.label: disabled
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Artificial_Disabled.descripti: Unit is currently entirely disabled, and is inert.
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Artificial_ComplexityRelation: This unit is experiencing side-effects of their current level of programming relative to their maximum complexity handling capacity. If the drone is under their baseline capacity, they will receive minor boosts.
